makeImmutable

  • makeImmutable(): void
    • Defined in src/runtime/entity.ts:119

    Prevents further mutation of this Entity instance. Note that calling this method only affects this particular Entity instance; the entity it represents (in a data store somewhere) can still be mutated by others. Also note that this doesn't necessarily offer any security against malicious developers.

    Returns void

mutate

  • mutate(mutation: Consumer<MutableEntityData> | __type): void
    • Defined in src/runtime/entity.ts:129

    Mutates the entity. Supply either the new data for the entity, which replaces the existing entity's data entirely, or a mutation function. The supplied mutation function will be called with a mutable copy of the entity's data. The mutations performed by that function will be reflected in the original entity instance (i.e. mutations applied in place).

    Parameters

    • mutation: Consumer<MutableEntityData> | __type

    Returns void
